snippet: JPMorgan Chase board members are trying to make the case that the bank’s chief executive should remain chairman as well. | Last year was all about perks for chief executives. | Marissa Mayer has bought six start-ups since taking the reins of Yahoo....
abstract: JPMorgan Chase board members are trying to make the case that the bank’s chief executive should remain chairman as well. | Last year was all about perks for chief executives. | Marissa Mayer has bought six start-ups since taking the reins of Yahoo. | Once considered out of fashion, the study of capitalism has a new status in academic circles.

headline.main: JPMorgan Works to Shore Up Support for Dimon
